snippet.title: Judge Reacts to Amber Heard Failing To Get Case Dismissed
snippet.description:
Judge Reacts to Amber Heard Failing To Get Case Dismissed

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT 👇

Amber Heard ATTACKS LAPD In Court - They Fight Back…

https://youtu.be/JuOr_czN_9E

Amber Heard Booed And Humiliated As Her Show Flops…

https://youtu.be/Klv09j42dS8

Related videos:

"Not Even A Close Call" Judge Reacts To Amber Heard Failing To Get Case Dismissed

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kHNx_Jz_21c

Judge LOSES IT After Amber Heard Tries to Get Case Dismissed For the THIRD TIME!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kNIX9_jhC2A

This is one of the most tiring legal battles in the Hollywood history! Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been fighting over 4 years now. However, it is already can be said that there is a slow progress in this case and it becomes clear that Johnny Depp will get the justice he deserves any time soon. The case is still going on in the US and so far, the judges are presiding over the suit are ruling in favor of Johnny Depp. With all the new evidence coming up, it is clear that Amber Heard might lose the legal battle and to avoid that Amber Heard’s lawyers have tried everything to get the court to toss out the defamation suit and adopt the ruling of the UK libel case.
We all know that it's a really difficult battle for Johnny Depp and that the consequences are really dramatic for him, because he lost so many roles and Hollywood started boycotting him. JD even spoke up about cancel culture recently and said that he is a victim of cancel culture and that “no one is safe” from the movement, calling on people to “stand up” for people facing “injustice”.
“It can be seen as an event in history that lasted for however long it lasted, this cancel culture, this instant rush to judgement based on what essentially amounts to polluted air,” he commented ahead of receiving the honorary Donostia Award at this year’s San Sebastian Film Festival.
“It’s so far out of hand now that I can promise you that no one is safe. Not one of you. No one out that door. No one is safe,” he continued. “It takes one sentence and there’s no more ground, the carpet has been pulled. It’s not just me that this has happened to, it’s happened to a lot of people. This type of thing has happened to women, men. Sadly, at a certain point they begin to think that it’s normal. Or that it’s them. When it’s not.”
Plus, Johnny Depp suffered a major defeat in the British High Court last year when a judge ruled that it wasn’t libelous to describe him as a “wife-beater”, but losing one battle isn’t the end of the war.
The big finale is coming in Fairfax County, Virginia in mid-2022, where he’s suing Amber Heard for $50M over a Washington Post op-ed she wrote about her experience as a victim of domestic vi*lence. We all remember that article, that Amber Heard wrote in 2018 for the Washington Post, and how Amber Heard was praised by many women first. Amber Heard even called herself a ‘public figure representing domestic ab*se’ and she said: ‘I feel the full force of our culture’s wrath for women who speak out’. Even though Johnny’s name wasn’t mentioned anywhere in Amber’s op-ed, it was not difficult to figure out who Amber was referring to. Plus, Amber Heard claimed to be a survivor of domestic abuse.
Since the article went viral, Johnny Depp has become an object of public hate and Johnny Depp lost some of his roles and his life was never the same. Well, Johnny Depp was not ready to be defeated and in 2019 Johnny Depp sued U.K. newspaper The Sun for referring to him in a story as a “wife-beater.” And as it was already said, the judge found the paper’s claims to be substantially true, based largely on Amber Heard’s own testimony and JD lost the battle.  
However, JD also sued Amber Heard for $50 million for defamation over the article and this time celebs and even media outlets had already understood that Amber has been lying all this time and she’s not a victim at all. She is the one who made up a vicious plan to destroy Johnny Depp’s life. 

So, now I want to know your opinion. Do you think Amber Heard will win this time? Or she is going to fail and we all will celebrate Johnny Depp’s triumph? Let me know your opinion in the comments section down below. And thanks for watching this video and don’t forget to hit that subscribe button.
